translation.en: Kabarkai! Kabarkai!
How come the axe did not split his chest?
translation.fr: Pourquoi la hache n'a pas fendu sa poitrine ?

translation.en: His magic is powerful.
His mother is a priestess.
They call her Zumbura,
the Oracle of Tukur Tukur.
I will show you.
They say she is the greatest power in all of Zazzau.
translation.fr: On dit qu'elle est la plus grande puissance de Zazzau.

translation.en: And she lives alone in the great cave,
translation.fr: Elle vit seule dans une grande grotte

translation.en: high on the mountain of Tukur Tukur.
translation.fr: dans la montagne de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: Where's your hero? Here comes mine.
Conqueror Kabarkai!
Conqueror Kabarkai! Conqueror Kabarkai!
Conqueror Kabarkai! Conqueror Kabarkai!
translation.fr: Dogo, le fils de Zumbura Kabarkai !

translation.en: Baba, who is he?
That young man there
is the prince of Igala.
His uncle rules over the people of their land as regent.
translation.fr: Son oncle règne sur leur peuple comme régent.

translation.en: That dirty slave is a prince?
translation.fr: Cet esclave si sale est un prince ?

translation.en: This is not a play. It's a competition!
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un jeu, mais une compétition !

translation.en: Show them the difference! This is not a play. It's a competition!
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un jeu, mais une compétition ! Montre-leur la différence ! Ce n'est pas un jeu !

translation.en: Show them the difference! This is not a play. It's a competition!
translation.fr: Montre-leur la différence ! Ce n'est pas un jeu, c'est une compétition !
Montre-leur la différence ! Ce n'est pas un jeu, c'est une compétition !

translation.en: Never!
Kill that man at your own peril.
translation.fr: Tue cet homme à tes risques et périls.

translation.en: - Take both of them away. - No! This is injustice.
I want my freedom. I want my freedom.
Come back here!
- Aladi Ameh. No! - Danjuma!
- Aladi Ameh! - Danjuma!
- - We have been looking for you.
I am Amina.
You will be my friend.
Are you slaves too?
I am Amina.
- What's your name? - Aladi Ameh.
Princesses.
Amina, Zaria, come with me at once.
translation.fr: Amina, Zaria, venez avec moi tout de suite.

translation.en: Sarki says she comes with us.
translation.fr: Le sarki a dit qu'elle venait avec nous.

translation.en: No. The sarki should have told me that. Not you. This is no place for princesses.
translation.fr: Non. Le sarki me l'aurait dit à moi. Ce n'est pas un lieu pour des princesses.

translation.en: Touch me again, and my father will hear how badly you bruised my arm.
translation.fr: Retouche-moi et mon père en entendra parler.

translation.en: - - Princess.
Open this gate.  For the sake of your father's dignity.
translation.fr: - Ouvre ce portail. - Pour la dignité de votre père.

translation.en: - If not, for my head. - Free her at once.
translation.fr: Sinon, pour ma tête. - Libérez-la. - Revenez au palais.

translation.en: - Come back to the palace. -
Princess, where are you going? Princess, come back.
- Princess, come back here. - Come with me.
Princes Amina. Come with me.
Braveheart, you are hard to put down.
translation.fr: Un cœur courageux est dur à briser !

translation.en: You are made of steel. Hardship does not deter you.
translation.fr: Tu es fait d'acier. Les épreuves ne te découragent pas.

translation.en: Bones made of steel, veins made of wires.
translation.fr: Os en acier, veines en fer.

translation.en: This girl before you is a voluptuous woman.
translation.fr: Cette fille devant vous est une femme voluptueuse.

translation.en: - She is blessed with attractive eyes. -
With a pointed nose, slender lips,
translation.fr: avec un nez pointu, des lèvres minces

translation.en: and ample bosom.
- And her body is as soft as a cotton wool. -
translation.fr: Son corps est doux comme du coton.

translation.en: Greetings to you, O Madaki.
The king acknowledges your greetings.
Sun of Zazzau,
if I may, as a matter of great consequence.
translation.fr: si je puis me permettre de vous parler d'une affaire grave.

translation.en: Go on, Madaki.
As Madaki,
it is my honor and duty
to guarantee the serenity
and the safety of the seven kingdoms.
translation.fr: et la sécurité des sept royaumes.

translation.en: And to do that,
certain difficult decisions must be made.
translation.fr: certaines décisions difficiles doivent être prises.

translation.en: The immediate execution…
of Igala rebel, Danjuma,
is of highest importance.
One.
As an heir to the Igala Kingdom
translation.fr: en tant qu'héritier du royaume Igala.

translation.en: as well as one who vanquished
translation.fr: Mais c'est aussi lui qui a vaincu

translation.en: the champion of Zazzau.
He has set up an example to other vassals
translation.fr: Il a donné l'exemple à d'autres vassaux.

translation.en: that Zazzau shall disregard at her future peril.
translation.fr: Si Zazzau l'ignore, son futur est en péril.

translation.en: I agree with Madaki.
Zazzau must meet this threat with the greatest possible response.
translation.fr: Zazzau doit affronter cette menace avec fermeté.

translation.en: I suggest something public.
translation.fr: Je suggère quelque chose de public.

translation.en: Extremely--
Greetings, O Princess, Daughter of the Great King.
translation.fr: Salutations, princesse, fille du grand roi.

translation.en: - The king acknowledges your presence. - I greet you, Great Heir to Her Father.
translation.fr: - Le roi te salue. - Je te salue, Héritière de Son Père.

translation.en: May your days be long, Sarki.
You know better than to interrupt Zazzau's supreme council.
translation.fr: Tu interromps le conseil suprême de Zazzau.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau, who reigns always in equity.
translation.fr: Ô Soleil de Zazzau, qui règne toujours en équité.

translation.en: Yesterday, the prince was denied his right to finish his duel victoriously.
translation.fr: Hier, le prince s'est vu refuser le droit de finir son duel victorieusement.

translation.en: And now, he must die dishonorably?
Go back to your chamber.
God has blessed her with a pointed nose.
translation.fr: Dieu l'a bénie d'un nez pointu,

translation.en: Blessed with beautiful lips, upright breast. - She is also gap- toothed. -
translation.fr: de belles lèvres, de seins droits et des dents du bonheur.

translation.en: Behold the one who embraces the talking drum.
translation.fr: Celle qui excelle au tambour parlant.

translation.en: Leave her. Leave her alone.
Leave her alone.
This one I have been instructed to take her to the Madaki.
translation.fr: On m'a dit de l'emmener auprès du Madaki.

translation.en: Leave her alone. Leave her.
Lack of money is preventing me from buying her.
translation.fr: Le manque d'argent m'empêche de l'acheter.

translation.en: I'm selling her to you, even though I love her.
translation.fr: Je te la vends, même si je l'aime.

translation.en: Kul!
Baba?
Are you angry with me?
Oh, my angel.
My good angel. Come on, sit, sit, sit.
Oh.  Are you all right?
I have one last appeal, Baba.
Your requests never end.
I desire to know how to use weapons like one of your soldiers, Baba.
translation.fr: Je veux savoir manier les armes comme un de tes soldats.

translation.en: Weapons, Amina?
But why?
We protect our women in Zazzau.
translation.fr: On protège nos femmes à Zazzau.

translation.en: It has always been this way.
All right.
Musa will teach both of you how to wield a sword.
translation.fr: Musa vous apprendra à toutes les deux à manier l'épée.

translation.en: No.
I want to be trained by a real soldier, not an old man who limps.
translation.fr: Je veux être entraînée par un vrai soldat, pas un vieux qui boîte.

translation.en: Well,
we can't spare a soldier just to train you.
translation.fr: on ne peut prendre un soldat juste pour vous entraîner.

translation.en: The Madaki wouldn't like that. Does the Madaki have any use for the Kabarkai?
translation.fr: - Ça ne plairait pas au Madaki. - Le Madaki se sert-il du Kabarkai ?

translation.en: Is this she?
Don't be afraid.
Ah, a gift from the gods.
For this honor, my friend,
you can have anything you desire in the seven kingdoms of Zazzau
translation.fr: tu peux avoir tout ce que tu désires dans les sept royaumes de Zazzau,

translation.en: apart from my chair.
By the way, Madaki,
my daughters are to be trained in all the fighting weapons and skills of Zazzau.
translation.fr: mes filles vont apprendre l'art des armes et du combat de Zazzau.

translation.en: The Kabarkai will be their instructor.
Arrange this.
Train in war? Majesty, Princess?
translation.fr: S'entraîner à la guerre ? Majesté, une princesse ?

translation.en: But why?
It is a fancy of Amina's, and I'm disposed to see
translation.fr: Amina le désire, et je voudrais voir

translation.en: how proficient she, in particular, turns out.
O Sun of Zazzau.
May you live forever.
No woman has ever dreamt of joining Zazzau's armies.
translation.fr: Aucune femme n'a jamais rêvé de rejoindre les armées de Zazzau.

translation.en: Only the recklessly foolish will dare its actualization.
Enough, Madaki! Do you question me?
translation.fr: Ça suffit, Madaki ! Doutes-tu de moi ?

translation.en: Forgive me, Majesty.
You've spoken magnificently.
Sit.
Eat.
Greetings.
You are no longer part of the army of Zazzau.
translation.fr: Tu ne fais plus partie de l'armée de Zazzau.

translation.en: What?
This is an elite army.
Our enemies fear us.
We will not be burdened by a cripple…
even if he is the Kabarkai,
former champion of Zazzau.
The daughters of the sarki requested for you.
translation.fr: Les filles du sarki t'ont demandé.

translation.en: You have been assigned to train them to fight like soldiers.
translation.fr: Tu les entraîneras à combattre comme un soldat.

translation.en: I'll rather go back to my goats on the mountain of Tukur Tukur
translation.fr: Je préfère retourner à mes chèvres de Tukur Tukur

translation.en: than bear this insult from my sarki.
translation.fr: que d'être insulté par mon sarki.

translation.en: Watch your mouth.
translation.fr: Attention à ce que tu dis.

translation.en: The day comes quickly, O Sarki.
translation.fr: Le jour fatidique arrive, Ô Sarki.

translation.en: Nothing has changed in 12 years, Priestess.
translation.fr: Rien n'a changé en 12 ans, prêtresse.

translation.en: My family means more to me than the seven kingdoms themselves.
translation.fr: Ma famille compte plus pour moi que les sept royaumes.

translation.en: And I must not bring dishonor
translation.fr: Et je ne dois pas déshonorer

translation.en: to the throne of my fathers.
You yourself, unwittingly,
have taken the first step in fulfilling her destiny.
translation.fr: tu as fait le premier pas pour accomplir son destin.

translation.en: Have you been talking to her?
I told you to stay away.
I did stay away.
But now, the time is fast approaching.
Purpose itself will drive her to me.
translation.fr: Son destin la mènera à moi.

translation.en: I will burn all of Hausa land
translation.fr: Je brûlerai toutes les terres haoussas

translation.en: before I let you touch her, Priestess.
translation.fr: avant de te laisser la toucher, prêtresse.

translation.en: My journey is long,
even for the swift.
One last word to a king who was once wise.
translation.fr: Un dernier mot à un roi jadis sage.

translation.en: Beyond what you see,
translation.fr: Au-delà de ce que tu vois,

translation.en: clouds of change gather.
translation.fr: les nuages du changement se rassemblent.

translation.en: None can stop it.
And you will do yourself great harm
translation.fr: Et tu te feras beaucoup de mal

translation.en: if you continue on the path of resistance!
translation.fr: si tu continues à y résister.

translation.en: You dare threaten me?
I told you no, Amina.
You can't have her.
Her presence will constantly put your life
translation.fr: Sa présence mettra constamment ta vie

translation.en: and your sister's at risk.
translation.fr: et celle de ta sœur en danger.

translation.en: All right.
You may keep her.
But she is never to leave the palace, ever.
translation.fr: Mais elle ne quittera jamais le palais.

translation.en: My father.
May your days be long.
Be strong, Amina! Be strong! Be strong, Amina! Be strong!
Be strong! Be strong! Be strong!
- I won. - You won by a fluke, Princess.
translation.fr: - J'ai gagné. - Un coup de chance.

translation.en: That must be a second fluke. I won yesterday, remember?
translation.fr: Un deuxième. J'ai gagné hier, souviens-toi.

translation.en: Sun of Zazzau.
I bring you grave news.
translation.fr: Je vous apporte une grave nouvelle.

translation.en: Everything about you these days is grave news, Madaki.
translation.fr: Tout est toujours grave avec toi, Madaki.

translation.en: Forgive your servant, Majesty.
But this war with the Jukuns makes mine an unenviable task
translation.fr: Cette guerre avec les Jukuns me donne la tâche peu enviable

translation.en: of dealing with your enemies.
Since when do enemies offer anything but woeful tidings?
translation.fr: Les ennemis n'offrent que de mauvaises nouvelles.

translation.en: Spare me the speeches. How is the war going?
translation.fr: Épargne-moi tes discours. Comment se passe la guerre ?

translation.en: It has lingered far longer than you told me.
translation.fr: Elle dure plus longtemps que prévu.

translation.en: Yes, Majesty.
But the Jukuns do not fight like men, like fleeting shadows.
translation.fr: Les Jukuns se battent comme des ombres, non des hommes.

translation.en: Now they strike, then they melt into the forest.
translation.fr: Ils frappent, puis disparaissent dans la forêt.

translation.en: But the Igala regent is on the offensive again.
translation.fr: Le régent Igala est à nouveau sur l'offensive.

translation.en: I just received news that he has crossed the border.
translation.fr: J'ai appris qu'il avait traversé la frontière.

translation.en: And his army ransacked the province
translation.fr: Son armée a saccagé la province

translation.en: with the knowledge that we cannot oppose them.
translation.fr: en sachant qu'on ne pouvait les affronter.

translation.en: What is our strength in the camp outside Zazzau?
translation.fr: Et nos forces dans le campement en dehors de Zazzau ?

translation.en: Less than 10,000 foot soldiers
and 200 cavalry.
That is not enough
to defend Zazzau if he is insane enough to attack the city.
translation.fr: à défendre Zazzau s'il est assez fou pour attaquer la ville.

translation.en: Recall the army.
Send a strong force to halt Igala's advance.
translation.fr: Envoie une unité pour arrêter l'avancée d'Igala.

translation.en: That means war on two fronts.
Then call the Jukuns to a table to discuss the terms of a truce.
translation.fr: Alors négocions une trêve avec les Jukuns.

translation.en: My lord, did you ask for Princess Amina's hand in marriage?
translation.fr: Monseigneur, avez-vous demandé la main d'Amina ?

translation.en: I'm not good enough for his daughter.
translation.fr: Je ne mérite pas sa fille.

translation.en: Nobody is good enough for his precious daughters.
translation.fr: Personne ne mérite ses précieuses filles.

translation.en: Especially Princess Amina.
In his eyes, she will do no wrong.
translation.fr: À ses yeux, elle est parfaite.

translation.en: After all, she's the Queen of Zazzau.
translation.fr: Après tout, c'est la reine de Zazzau.

translation.en: But in my eyes…
no queen is more royal…
than you.
Don't you forget that.
As soon as…
Zazzau is mine,
you will know who my real consort is.
translation.fr: tu sauras qui est ma vraie épouse.

translation.en: So, my lord, what are we going to do now?
Something desperate.
When you get to the palace,
pass word to Kabarkai
to see me privately.
My lord, you cannot trust that man.
translation.fr: Cet homme n'est pas digne de confiance.

translation.en: I have seen him with Amina.
He practically worships her.
There's one thing all men worship,
translation.fr: Tous les hommes vénèrent une chose,

translation.en: and I have them in abundance.
From the best grapes of Tripoli.
Enjoy, my friend.
There's many more to come.
The daughters of the sarki…
are to have…
a small training accident.
Both will perish…
trying to save their beloved instructor.
translation.fr: en essayant de sauver leur professeur adoré.

translation.en: Only you will survive.
Yes.
For a while, you will be thrown into the dungeon.
translation.fr: Pendant un moment, tu seras jeté au donjon.

translation.en: But I will have you spirited away.
And when I am sarki…
you shall lead all the Zazzau's army.
translation.fr: tu dirigeras toute l'armée de Zazzau.

translation.en: So, you finally make your move. Long overdue, my friend.
translation.fr: - Vous tentez enfin votre chance. - Cela fait trop longtemps, mon ami.

translation.en: ♪ Sun, sun come shine ♪
Is he with us, Madaki?
♪ You can have the blood ♪
No.
♪ I will slaughter a ram for you ♪
translation.fr: Je massacrerai un bélier pour toi

translation.en: The Kabarkai said no to you?
translation.fr: Le Kabarkai vous a dit non ?

translation.en: No.
- - But he pretends to be drunk.
translation.fr: Mais il a fait semblant d'être ivre

translation.en: And depart without his gold.
translation.fr: et est parti sans son or. Tu auras le sang

translation.en: Since when will a soldier drink
until he forgot…
…a bag of gold?
He flees to the safety of his mother's cave.
translation.fr: Il va se réfugier dans la grotte de sa mère.

translation.en: We can get him there.
So, you just make sure that he doesn't return to the palace.
translation.fr: Assure-toi qu'il ne rentre pas au palais.

translation.en: I'll find another way.
We meet well, Your Highness.
It's been many seasons of rains, my old friend.
translation.fr: Ça fait bien des saisons des pluies, mon vieil ami.

translation.en: Yes.
I'd have wished for more of those peaceful years for you and I.
translation.fr: J'aurais aimé plus d'années de paix entre nous.

translation.en: And you have not kept your side of the bargain.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas respecté ta part du marché.

translation.en: The boy seems fortified.
But don't you worry. I've thrown him to the dungeon for many seasons now.
translation.fr: Mais ne t'inquiète pas, je l'ai jeté au donjon il y a bien des saisons.

translation.en: My friend from the desert,
as long as my nephew is alive,
translation.fr: tant que mon neveu est en vie,

translation.en: he remains a threat to my throne.
translation.fr: il reste une menace pour mon trône.

translation.en: Send him to us.
I'll send the Ijuma to neutralize the charm.
But remember, I do not want his blood on my hands.
translation.fr: Mais je ne veux pas de son sang sur mes mains.

translation.en: War with the Jukuns approaches
translation.fr: La guerre contre les Jukuns approche

translation.en: as surely as dawn after night.
At the moment, I want peace on our border with the Igalas.
translation.fr: Je veux la paix à notre frontière avec les Igalas.

translation.en: Where is the rebel?
I have sent for him.
For how long have you been…
a prisoner of Zazzau?
- Too long, Madaki. - I agree.
And now I have an important undertaking for you.
translation.fr: J'ai une mission importante pour toi.

translation.en: If you do it well…
translation.fr: Si tu la mènes à bien,

translation.en: your freedom and that of your cousin is guaranteed.
translation.fr: ta liberté et celle de ta cousine sont garanties.

translation.en: A communication to your uncle, regent of Igala.
translation.fr: Un message à ton oncle, régent d'Igala.

translation.en: There are a lot of caravan bandits here.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de bandits par ici.

translation.en: Let me have a sword.
Look!
They wear Igala's colors.
It is doubtless a welcome party for their returning prince.
translation.fr: Un comité d'accueil pour le retour de leur prince.

translation.en: But how did they know I'm coming?
You… recognize someone?
My father's priest.
Ijuma, the Wise One.
Beware, my prince. Treachery!
translation.fr: Attention, mon prince. C'est un piège !

translation.en: - Treachery? - Treachery!
- Soldiers! - Ijuma.
- Ijuma, say something, please! -
Greetings, O Prince.
Greetings, O Prince.
Outrageous news,
the attack on you, nephew.
translation.fr: cette attaque contre toi, mon neveu.

translation.en: My scout will not rest until they seize those springers.
translation.fr: Mon éclaireur capturera ces bandits coûte que coûte.

translation.en: And I swear
that by their toes they shall hang,
and I will feed their bodies to the vultures.
translation.fr: avant que je ne donne leurs corps aux vautours.

translation.en: Old Ijuma is dead.
I hear.
Tragedy is never far from us.
translation.fr: La tragédie n'est jamais loin de nous.

translation.en: Igala will mourn him for many days.
translation.fr: Igala le pleurera bien des jours.

translation.en: And now, what tidings do you bring us?
I am on an errand from the Madaki.
translation.fr: Je suis en mission pour le Madaki.

translation.en: The war general and emissary of the Sun of Zazzau,
translation.fr: Le général de guerre et émissaire du Soleil de Zazzau,

translation.en: the Sarki of the Seven Kingdoms.
Well…
you shall have my reply before your departure.
translation.fr: tu auras ma réponse avant ton départ.

translation.en: But now,
I am sure a hot bath and a very good meal
translation.fr: je suis sûr qu'un bain et un bon repas

translation.en: is a welcome idea.
And then we shall talk like brothers,
Yes, my lord.
This is a dangerous time for you to return, my son.
translation.fr: Tu reviens à un moment dangereux, mon fils.

translation.en: Your father was a great king.
translation.fr: Ton père était un grand roi.

translation.en: His dying command to Ijuma was to keep you safe.
translation.fr: Son dernier ordre à Ijuma était de te protéger.

translation.en: This, Ijuma did with sacrifices to the gods for the last 15 years.
translation.fr: Ijuma l'a fait avec des sacrifices aux dieux depuis 15 ans.

translation.en: Therefore, your uncle could do you no harm.
translation.fr: Donc ton oncle ne pouvait rien contre toi.

translation.en: Beware, my prince.
But now, instead, he planned, and Ijuma is dead.
translation.fr: Il a prévu son coup, et Ijuma est mort.

translation.en: And I don't know
how much longer the protective charm will last.
translation.fr: combien de temps le sort protecteur durera.

translation.en: Therefore, you must flee.
Flee? To where?
I had given up hope of ever seeing you again, my cousin.
translation.fr: J'avais perdu espoir de te revoir un jour, mon cousin.

translation.en: Did you see my mother in Igala? Will my father soon secure our freedom?
translation.fr: As-tu vu ma mère à Igala ? Mon père va-t-il bientôt nous libérer ?

translation.en: I had no time, Aladi Ameh.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu le temps, Aladi Ameh.

translation.en: In Igala, I was running for my life itself.
translation.fr: À Igala , j'ai dû fuir pour ma vie.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Where else will we be safe if not Igala land?
translation.fr: Où serons-nous en sécurité, sinon à Igala ?

translation.en: I thought so too.
Your friends are coming.
My cousin, be careful.
War is coming. I have to take my leave now.
translation.fr: La guerre approche. Je dois partir.

translation.en: We've been looking for you everywhere, Aladi.
War is coming.
- The soldiers are looking at me strangely. - And who told you that?
translation.fr: - Les soldats me regardent. - Qui t'a dit ça ?

translation.en: Rekiya says I will be taken back to the slave quarters.
translation.fr: On va me remettre avec les esclaves.

translation.en: No, Aladi Ameh.
You are safe with me and Amina. We will protect you.
translation.fr: Tu es en sécurité. Nous te protégerons.

translation.en: You can't protect me from your father.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez me protéger contre votre père.

translation.en: He will listen to Madaki.
They will send me back to the slave quarters.
translation.fr: Ils me renverront avec les esclaves.

translation.en: - Nobody trusts me. - Aladi Ameh, we trust you.
translation.fr: - Personne ne me fait confiance. - Nous, si.

translation.en: Prove it.
Everything okay?
The princes of Zazzau are pressuring Baba to give my hand out in marriage.
translation.fr: Les princes de Zazzau poussent mon père à me marier.

translation.en: They are asking for mine also.
- I'll choose my prince when I'm ready. - How'd you know when you're ready?
translation.fr: - Je me marierai quand je serai prête. - Comment le sauras-tu ?

translation.en: I will.
Yes. But how?
I've been in love before. With Musa.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà été amoureuse, de Musa.

translation.en: Musa?
I was ten years old,
and to me, he seemed really gallant in his palace guard uniform and sword.
translation.fr: et il me semblait tellement beau dans son uniforme avec son épée.

translation.en: Every time I heard his voice, I would run and hide
translation.fr: Quand j'entendais sa voix, je me cachais,

translation.en: because I felt like a thousand butterflies were flying in my stomach.
translation.fr: car je sentais mille papillons dans mon estomac.

translation.en: And that is love?
I almost believed you.
- - A thousand butterflies in your stomach?
This is sad.
We are the daughters of the sarki, Sun of the Seven Kingdoms,
translation.fr: Nous sommes les filles du sarki, Soleil des sept royaumes,

translation.en: and we do not know the first thing about love.
translation.fr: et nous ne savons rien de l'amour.

translation.en: We can hire a teacher.
Man or woman?
Sarki will have a heart attack if we choose any man,
translation.fr: Le cœur du sarki lâchera si on choisit un homme,

translation.en: even a eunuch, to train us in the skills of love.
translation.fr: même un eunuque, pour nous enseigner l'amour.

translation.en: One thing I know is that
I would not marry Madaki and become his sixth wife.
translation.fr: Je ne deviendrai pas la sixième femme de Madaki.

translation.en: He is almost as old as Baba. His eyes follow me everywhere I go.
translation.fr: - Il est presque aussi vieux que papa. - Ses yeux me suivent partout.

translation.en: - Hungry hyena. - Ah!
What is it, Musa?
The Kabarkai fled to the hills of Tukur Tukur last night.
translation.fr: Le Kabarkai a fui dans les montagnes de Tukur Tukur hier soir.

translation.en: Fled? Why?
He was attacked last night outside the city walls.
translation.fr: Il a été attaqué hors des murs de la ville.

translation.en: People say by spies working for Aladi Ameh's father.
translation.fr: On dit que des espions travaillent pour le père d'Aladi Ameh.

translation.en: The guards have taken Aladi Ameh to the slave quarters.
translation.fr: On a ramené Aladi Ameh avec les esclaves.

translation.en: What?
Who gave that order? It's the Madaki.
translation.fr: - Qui en a donné l'ordre ? - Le Madaki.

translation.en: The spies were coming for her when they ran into the Kabarkai
translation.fr: Les espions venaient la chercher et sont tombés sur Kabarkai,

translation.en: because of the war.
If the Kabarkai runs to his mother,
translation.fr: Si le Kabarkai accourt auprès de sa mère,

translation.en: obviously he runs from enemies inside Zazzau.
translation.fr: il fuit des ennemis dans Zazzau.

translation.en: Only the Madaki can threaten the Kabarkai.
translation.fr: Seuls le Madaki peut menacer le Kabarkai.

translation.en: I have a second errand for you, Danjuma.
translation.fr: J'ai une deuxième mission pour toi, Danjuma.

translation.en: You will go with two of my men
translation.fr: Tu iras avec deux de mes hommes

translation.en: to the cave of Tukur Tukur.
translation.fr: à la grotte de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: There is a man hiding there.
An enemy to both you and I.
I want you to finish what you have started.
translation.fr: Finis ce que tu as commencé.

translation.en: The Kabarkai?
Get rid of him.
And I'll see that you and Aladi Ameh
translation.fr: Et je m'assurerai qu'Aladi Ameh et toi

translation.en: return to Igala in one piece.
translation.fr: rentriez à Igala en un seul morceau.

translation.en: Move away.
I said move away now.
Open that door!
Aladi Ameh, are you in here?
- Amina. Amina. - Aladi, where are you?
Princess, please come out.
My princess, please. I beg you. Come out, please.
translation.fr: Princesse. Je vous en supplie. Sortez.

translation.en: Her father and his people
will never hurt her.
translation.fr: ne lui feront jamais de mal.

translation.en: Yes, my people are searching for the spy.
And in the heat of the battle
translation.fr: Et dans le feu de l'action,

translation.en: the girl might be harmed or even killed.
translation.fr: la fille pourrait être blessée ou tuée.

translation.en: Get her out of the pit, Madaki.
Perhaps I should keep her closer to me.
translation.fr: Devrais-je la garder plus près de moi.

translation.en: No spy will ever know that she is in my place.
translation.fr: Aucun espion ne saura qu'elle est chez moi.

translation.en: What is wrong with you, Madaki?
You have all the young women in the seven kingdoms.
translation.fr: Tu as toutes les jeunes femmes des sept royaumes.

translation.en: Please, leave my daughters and their friends alone.
translation.fr: Laisse mes filles et leurs amies tranquilles.

translation.en: Majesty. I made a mistake.
On my shoulder lies the burden of protecting Zazzau.
translation.fr: Sur mes épaules repose le fardeau de protéger Zazzau.

translation.en: You have only the pleasure of serving me.
translation.fr: Tu n'as que le plaisir de me servir.

translation.en: The seven kingdoms are mine,
translation.fr: C'est à moi de protéger les sept royaumes,

translation.en: not yours to protect.
My burden and not yours!
translation.fr: C'est mon fardeau, et non le tien !

translation.en: Mighty Sun of Zazzau.
Sarki of the Seven Kingdoms.
- The Water of the Great Desert. - What is it, Musa?
translation.fr: - L'Eau du Grand Désert. - Qu'y a-t-il, Musa ?

translation.en: The princesses, Sarki. They have joined Aladi Ameh in the slave dungeon.
translation.fr: Les princesses, Sarki, ont rejoint Aladi Ameh au donjon des esclaves.

translation.en: - What? - I know nothing of this.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Je ne suis pas au courant.

translation.en: - My daughters are in the dungeon… -- I go. …because of your meddling.
translation.fr: Mes filles sont dans le donjon, car tu fourres ton nez partout.

translation.en: You fools! Get out!
Run to the dungeon! Kill anyone that tries to stop you.
translation.fr: Au donjon ! Tuez ceux qui voudront vous arrêter !

translation.en: Move. Leave. Get out! Get out!
And you, are you still here?
translation.fr: Et toi, tu es encore là ?

translation.en: Your Majesty.
I love my daughters
and I will use all my power
translation.fr: et je me servirai de tout mon pouvoir

translation.en: to destroy anybody that threatens their lives.
translation.fr: pour détruire ceux qui menacent leur vie.

translation.en: Is the sarki still angry with the Madaki?
translation.fr: Le sarki est-il toujours en colère contre le Madaki ?

translation.en: Why are you so concerned for him?
He brought me to you, my lord.
translation.fr: Il m'a amenée à vous, monseigneur.

translation.en: I only feel gratitude.
translation.fr: Je ne ressens que de la gratitude.

translation.en: I see.
Don't do this, Amina.
It's too risky. Spies are everywhere.
translation.fr: C'est trop risqué. Il y a des espions partout.

translation.en: I am Amina. I fear nobody. My mind is made up.
translation.fr: Je suis Amina. Je ne crains personne. Ma décision est prise.

translation.en: Tell no one about this. Not even Zaria.
translation.fr: Ne le dis à personne. Pas même Zaria.

translation.en: This is rash, Amina.
Your father will send me back to the dungeon.
translation.fr: Ton père va me renvoyer au donjon.

translation.en: You are late!
You are late.
You are the priestess.
I met you once as a child.
I am Amina. Princess of Zazzau.
translation.fr: Je suis Amina. Princesse de Zazzau.

translation.en: - First daughter to the Sun-- - I know who you are.
translation.fr: - Première fille du Soleil… - Je sais qui tu es.

translation.en: Who do you think
has watched over you since you were a child?
translation.fr: qui veille sur toi depuis ton enfance ?

translation.en: I came to find your son.  No.
translation.fr: - Je suis venue chercher ton fils. - Non.

translation.en: You came to find your destiny.
translation.fr: Tu es venue chercher ton destin.

translation.en: Come up.
You were expecting me?
You said I am late. Yes. You are late.
translation.fr: - Tu as dit que j'étais en retard. - Oui. Tu es en retard.

translation.en: If you had come to me earlier, the purpose of your destiny will not have been derailed.
translation.fr: Si tu étais venue me voir plus tôt, ta destinée n'aurait pas déraillé.

translation.en: But mere mortals and time
translation.fr: De simples mortels et le temps

translation.en: have conspired together to derail your destiny.
translation.fr: ont conspiré pour faire dérailler ton destin.

translation.en: Still,
there is another way.
translation.fr: il y a un autre moyen.

translation.en: - Make way. -
May God exalt you, O Heir Apparent.
Well?
No words from the mountain yet, my lord, but there is other news.
translation.fr: Pas de nouvelles de la montagne, mais il y a d'autres nouvelles.

translation.en: What news?
It's Amina.
Amina?
Finally.
They are here.
Who?
Don't be afraid.
I am Amina. I fear nobody.
translation.fr: Je suis Amina. Je ne crains personne.

translation.en: Don't you recognize your sister and your old guard?
translation.fr: Ne reconnais-tu pas ta sœur et ton ancien garde ?

translation.en: - I feel dizzy. - You should not have come.
translation.fr: - J'ai des vertiges. - Tu n'aurais pas dû venir.

translation.en: I couldn't let Musa go alone.
translation.fr: Je ne pouvais laisser Musa seul.

translation.en: I told Aladi not to tell anyone.
translation.fr: Aladi ne devait le dire à personne.

translation.en: Now the sarki will think I left the palace on my own.
translation.fr: Le sarki pensera que j'ai quitté le palais seule.

translation.en: Come with me.
I said come with me.
No.
She stays. Only you come with me.
translation.fr: Elle reste. Toi seule viens avec moi.

translation.en: My sister would have to come with me.
translation.fr: Ma sœur doit venir avec moi.

translation.en: No. Only you.
Come.
I'm not even interested in entering that dark place. There'll be bats and spiders.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas entrer là-dedans, il y a des chauves-souris et des araignées.

translation.en: Bats?
Be careful. Call to me if you need help. I'll come.
translation.fr: Fais attention. Appelle-moi si besoin. Je viendrai.

translation.en: Okay.
- Stretch out your hand. -
Listen.
There are hundreds of paths here.
translation.fr: Il y a des centaines de passages.

translation.en: If you get lost here, even I can't find you.
translation.fr: Si tu te perds, même moi ne pourrai te retrouver.

translation.en: Come with me.
I thought the great Amina fears nothing.
translation.fr: Je croyais que la grande Amina ne craignait rien.

translation.en: I am Amina. I fear nobody.
translation.fr: Je suis Amina. Je ne crains personne.

translation.en: I fear this darkness. It feels like I'm buried alive.
translation.fr: Je crains ces ténèbres. J'ai l'impression d'être enterrée vivante.

translation.en: What is this?
This is the cave of vision.
translation.fr: C'est la grotte de la vision.

translation.en: This is where Amina's story truly begins.
translation.fr: C'est ici que l'histoire d'Amina commence.

translation.en: I've seen this before. In my dark dreams.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà vu ça. Dans mes cauchemars.

translation.en: That is the woman you must become, Amina.
translation.fr: Voilà la femme que tu dois devenir, Amina.

translation.en: If you are to fulfill your dreams for Zazzau.
translation.fr: Si tu veux réaliser tes rêves pour Zazzau.

translation.en: And these people?
They are dead.
Who are they?
That is the heavy price
you will have to pay to fulfill your destiny.
translation.fr: à payer pour accomplir ton destin.

translation.en: Now, listen to me very carefully.
You will journey in disguise to Daura
and bring me the blood water from the well of Bayajidda.
translation.fr: et tu m'apporteras l'eau ensanglantée du puits de Bayajidda.

translation.en: And if I don't?
Your father will lose the throne of Zazzau,
translation.fr: Ton père perdra le trône de Zazzau

translation.en: and the entire people of Zazzau will perish.
translation.fr: et tout le peuple de Zazzau périra.

translation.en: How do I get to Daura?
I'll take you there.
I journey to Daura.
Daura?
That will take many suns.
- The sarki will miss us. - You are not coming, Zaria.
translation.fr: - Nous manquerons au sarki. - Tu ne viens pas, Zaria.

translation.en: It is too dangerous. You will return to the palace with Musa.
translation.fr: C'est trop dangereux. Retourne au palais avec Musa.

translation.en: But why, Amina? I can fight.
translation.fr: Mais pourquoi, Amina ? Je sais me battre.

translation.en: No, Zaria, no.
One of us has to remain in the palace with the sarki.
translation.fr: Reste au palais avec le sarki.

translation.en: I journey to Daura alone.
Let no one enter the city
translation.fr: Ne laisse personne entrer dans la ville

translation.en: or leave the city without my permission.
translation.fr: ou en sortir sans ma permission.

translation.en: Yes, my lord.
Musa!
Musa!
Princess. Greetings, my princess.
- You're far away from Zazzau's palace. - As are you.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes loin du palais de Zazzau. - Comme toi.

translation.en: Apparently, for some time now.
- My name is-- - I know who you are.
translation.fr: - Je suis… - Je sais qui tu es.

translation.en: You are Aladi Ameh's friend.
- Where is Princess Amina? - What makes you think we're together?
translation.fr: - Où est Amina ? - Pourquoi nous crois-tu ensemble ?

translation.en: Oh, my princess.
Everyone knows that wherever Amina is, Zaria won't be left behind.
translation.fr: Tout le monde sait qu'Amina et Zaria sont toujours ensemble.

translation.en: Perhaps in front this time around.
translation.fr: Peut-être que Zaria la devance, cette fois.

translation.en: Kai!
The princess's whereabouts is of no concern to you.
translation.fr: Où se trouve la princesse ne te concerne pas.

translation.en: You have still not told us where you're headed, Danjuma.
translation.fr: Tu ne nous as pas dit où tu allais, Danjuma.

translation.en: We're on our way to the mountains of Tukur Tukur.
translation.fr: On est en route pour Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: Oh, I see.
Hunting the spies that attacked the Kabarkai
translation.fr: Vous chassez les espions qui ont attaqué le Kabarkai,

translation.en: or perchance, the Kabarkai himself.
translation.fr: Vous chassez les espions qui ont attaqué le Kabarkai, ou le Kabarkai lui-même.

translation.en: Princess, there are things you know nothing about.
translation.fr: Princesse, il y a des choses que vous ignorez.

translation.en: Yes, I go in pursuit of the Kabarkai,
so do others worse than I.
translation.fr: comme d'autres, et pires que moi.

translation.en: If Amina is with the Kabarkai, then her life is in danger.
translation.fr: Si Amina est avec le Kabarkai, sa vie est en danger.

translation.en: I owe her my life. Where is she? Tell me. Where?
translation.fr: Je lui dois la vie. Où est-elle ? Dites-le-moi.

translation.en: You must go after them yourself.
I can't trust mere soldiers with the safety of my children.
translation.fr: Je ne peux confier la sécurité de mes filles à de simples soldats.

translation.en: Amina is too headstrong like I am.
translation.fr: Amina est trop têtue, comme moi.

translation.en: Bring her back to me, Madaki.
Sarki's orders, I obey.
Tell me, Danjuma.
Why are you here exactly?
It's a lengthy tale.
If you still have gold, they will come back.
translation.fr: Si tu as encore de l'or, ils reviendront.

translation.en: I suggest that we ride now and swap stories later.
This looks like ours.
Send somebody to the merchant of Samunaka.
translation.fr: Envoie quelqu'un au marchand de Samunaka.

translation.en: Somebody must have known what happened here last night.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un doit savoir ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: I hope the princesses are safe.
translation.fr: J'espère que les princesses vont bien.

translation.en: Wayyo!
The first city of my ancestors.
translation.fr: La première ville de mes ancêtres.

translation.en: We will wait here. I will ride to Daura alone.
translation.fr: Attendez ici. J'irai seul à Daura.

translation.en: Why?
To get the city guide who will take us to the well of Bayajidda.
translation.fr: Pour trouver celui qui nous mènera au puits.

translation.en: No, Kabarkai. We shall ride together.
Daura is too dangerous for a princess like you.
I'll be back before sunset.
My princess, we should go back.
I think you've been brainwashed by the priestess.
translation.fr: La prêtresse vous a lavé le cerveau.

translation.en: It looks like a conspiracy.
How?
I remember her prophecy about your future when you were born.
translation.fr: Je me souviens de sa prophétie sur votre avenir à votre naissance.

translation.en: For the same reason, she was banished by sarki.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'elle a été bannie par le sarki.

translation.en: Now, she has perfected the scheme to get you killed
translation.fr: Elle a comploté pour vous faire tuer

translation.en: for her son to have a chance of becoming sarki.
translation.fr: pour que son fils devienne sarki.

translation.en: Depart from my presence.
- My princess. - Just leave.
This is love in a strange land.
A love not meant to be.
So distant from mere mortals.
Like the stars, far in the sky.
translation.fr: Comme les étoiles, loin dans le ciel

translation.en: - So far, removed from the earth. -
Yet her rays light up every dark recess.
translation.fr: Pourtant leurs rayons illuminent Chaque recoin

translation.en: The hungry eyes can only look,
translation.fr: Les yeux affamés ne savent que regarder

translation.en: the thirsty soul can only long,
translation.fr: L'âme assoiffée ne sait que se languir

translation.en: no matter how much he cries,
the flight to reach is above the sky.
translation.fr: Le vol pour atteindre va au-delà du ciel

translation.en: Yet, hope is like a silly child
always pining for the impossible.
You've always been reckless, but this?
translation.fr: Tu as toujours été imprudente, mais ça ?

translation.en: I know.
Why did you do it?
He's the one, Zaria.
And you know this, how?
Each time I set my eyes on him,
translation.fr: À chaque fois que je le regarde,

translation.en: a thousand butterflies take a flight in my belly.
translation.fr: mille papillons volent dans mon ventre.

translation.en: You're reckless.
The well of Bayajidda
has not been opened for more than a lifetime.
translation.fr: n'a pas été ouvert depuis bien des années.

translation.en: You could've told us this earlier.
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu nous le dire.

translation.en: I imagined you wanted to see it, not open it.
translation.fr: Je pensais que vous vouliez le voir, non l'ouvrir.

translation.en: It is sealed for a reason.
translation.fr: Il est scellé pour une raison.

translation.en: - No. This is no ordinary well, my friends. -
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un puits ordinaire, mes amis.

translation.en: It was not constructed by man
translation.fr: Il n'a pas été construit par l'homme,

translation.en: but came to be by the magic of the great python called Sarki.
translation.fr: mais par la magie du grand python appelé Sarki.

translation.en: I will teach you and Princess Amina
about our people and the great Allah that rules over the whole world.
translation.fr: de notre peuple et du grand Allah qui règne sur le monde entier.

translation.en: What is this? Ibrahim.
Blood! Great evil! We must seal the well immediately.
translation.fr: Du sang ! Le Mal ! Il faut le sceller immédiatement.

translation.en: We have no right to open what has been hidden for so long.
translation.fr: On n'a pas le droit de l'ouvrir.

translation.en: This is why people lost interest?
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'il est abandonné ?

translation.en: I swear on my life,
translation.fr: Je le jure sur ma vie,

translation.en: I didn't know the curse of Sarki still held sway after all these years.
translation.fr: j'ignorais que la malédiction de Sarki était encore active !

translation.en: What is the curse of Sarki?
Once every quarter of a century, in the seasons of the full moon,
translation.fr: Tous les quarts de siècle, à la pleine lune,

translation.en: the well will turn to blood, and everywhere, the people will drop like flies.
translation.fr: l'eau du puits se transforme en sang et partout, les gens périssent.

translation.en: We call it the blood of Bayajidda.
translation.fr: On l'appelle le sang de Bayajidda.

translation.en: And you, you must give it back to the well.
translation.fr: Tu dois le rendre au puits.

translation.en: This is why we are here. We must take this blood to the priestess.
translation.fr: Il nous faut apporter ce sang à la prêtresse.

translation.en: Amina, move. Danjuma, get Zaria. I will come after you.
translation.fr: Amina, vite. Danjuma, va chercher Zaria. J'arrive.

translation.en: I told them. Even with one eye, you are still the champion of Zazzau.
translation.fr: Je leur avais dit. Même avec un œil, tu es toujours le héros de Zazzau.

translation.en: I never took you for a fool, Madaki.
They called me many names,
translation.fr: On m'a donné bien des noms,

translation.en: but never that, my friend.
Yet you threaten the Kabarkai with your arrows and sword.
translation.fr: Tu menaces le Kabarkai avec tes flèches et ton épée.

translation.en: Things change, my friend.
The blood on your body…
is it your victim's or yours?
translation.fr: à ta victime ou le tien ?

translation.en: The harlot took your powers away last night, so you bleed.
translation.fr: La catin t'a enlevé tes pouvoirs hier soir, donc tu saignes.

translation.en: One arrow cannot stop me, Madaki.
And I don't see your guards here to save you.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas tes gardes pour te sauver.

translation.en: I'll snap your neck.
translation.fr: Je vais te briser le cou.

translation.en: Sleep well, my friend.
Danjuma!
Who sent you?
Who sent you? Speak.
We had him. He would have talked.
translation.fr: On le tenait. Il aurait parlé.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
The lives of my princesses were threatened.
translation.fr: La vie de mes princesses était menacée.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
I expected more worthy thanks.
translation.fr: Je m'attendais à plus de remerciements.

translation.en: Your father, the sarki, sent me
translation.fr: Votre père, le sarki, m'a envoyé

translation.en: to bring you both back to Zazzau alive.
translation.fr: pour vous ramener vivantes à Zazzau.

translation.en: Where are Musa and Kabarkai?
Kabarkai will join us.
Almost 30,000 soldiers!
Fast approaching.
Who are they?
It's your brother, the regent, and his army.
translation.fr: C'est ton frère, le régent, et son armée.

translation.en: Princess, mount on your horse.
You and your sister must ride fast to Zazzau.
translation.fr: Vous et votre sœur devez vite aller à Zazzau.

translation.en: Thirty thousand soldiers are waiting for you at Gindin Kuka to escort you home.
translation.fr: Trente mille soldats vous attendent à Gindin Kuka pour vous escorter.

translation.en: I don't need your soldiers. I can find my way home.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin de vos soldats. Je trouverai mon chemin.

translation.en: You.
Release your horse to Zaria.
- I'll ride with the princesses. - Are you sure, Danjuma?
translation.fr: - Je vais avec elles. - Tu es sûr ?

translation.en: You don't have anything to be afraid of your uncle.
translation.fr: Tu n'as rien à craindre de ton oncle.

translation.en: I will ride with the princesses, Madaki.
We will defend you even with our blood.
translation.fr: Nous vous défendrons au péril de notre vie.

translation.en: We shall be glad if our lives save yours.
translation.fr: Nous serons heureux si nos vies sauvent la tienne.

translation.en: We would delay them valiantly.
We try to capture them alive.
If we can't, kill everybody, including Amina.
translation.fr: Sinon, tuez tout le monde, y compris Amina.

translation.en: But Princess Zaria must not be touched.
translation.fr: Mais Zaria ne doit pas être touchée.

translation.en: Not even a single hair from her body must touch the ground.
translation.fr: Pas un seul de ses cheveux ne doit toucher le sol.

translation.en: She belongs to Madaki. Did you hear that?
translation.fr: Elle appartient à Madaki. C'est compris ?

translation.en: Yes, sir!
Here they come.
Let's turn back.
- Move! -
Ride on. I will take care of her, Amina.
Zaria!
Zaria. Zaria.
O Sun of Zazzau.
Wayyo.
Zaria is dead.
What?
Tread on safely, Exalted One!
Tread on safely with your steel gilded shoe, O Mighty One.
translation.fr: Sois prudent avec ta chaussure dorée, Puissant Roi.

translation.en: Tread on safely, Majestic Ruler, the Destroyer of Ill Will,
translation.fr: Sois prudent, Souverain, destructeur de la Malveillance.

translation.en: the Tamer of All Ego and Compeller of Dissenters.
translation.fr: Dompteur de l'Ego qui contraint les dissidents.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau.
Words have just arrived from the regent.
translation.fr: On a reçu des nouvelles du régent.

translation.en: He's holding the Madaki hostage.
translation.fr: Il tient le Madaki en otage.

translation.en: He demands the return of his daughter and Prince Danjuma
translation.fr: Il exige le retour de sa fille et du prince Danjuma,

translation.en: in exchange for the Madaki.
I am ashamed to call you my daughter right now.
translation.fr: J'ai honte de t'appeler ma fille, à cet instant.

translation.en: That boy will return to his people.
Now, we know why he refused to go home.
translation.fr: On sait pourquoi il refusait de rentrer.

translation.en: This is the plan to seize the throne of Zazzau.
translation.fr: C'est le plan pour s'emparer du trône de Zazzau.

translation.en: And you have fallen into their trap.
translation.fr: Et tu es tombée dans leur piège.

translation.en: I know one thing, Baba.
Send Danjuma home and prepare to bury two daughters in one week.
translation.fr: Renvoie Danjuma et tu enterreras deux filles cette semaine.

translation.en: What has come over you, Amina?
Why do you grieve me so?
Is your sister's reckless death not enough blow to me?
translation.fr: La mort insensée de ta sœur ne suffit-elle pas ?

translation.en: Zaria will be avenged.
You will never marry that boy.
On her deathbed…
you swore to my mother,
translation.fr: tu as juré à ma mère,

translation.en: the love of your life,
that you would never force her daughters into marriage.
translation.fr: que tu ne forcerais jamais ses filles à se marier.

translation.en: Will you still honor that oath, Baba?
I'm now a soldier of Zazzau, Amina.
translation.fr: Je suis désormais un soldat de Zazzau, Amina.

translation.en: Perhaps, I may help Zazzau defeat my uncle
translation.fr: Je pourrais aider Zazzau à vaincre mon oncle

translation.en: and regain my throne.
Your father will look at me favorably then.
Your Highness.
I was ordered to prepare 5,000 soldiers for you.
translation.fr: On m'a ordonné de vous préparer 5 000 soldats.

translation.en: Has Danjuma taken over command yet?
Yes, Your Highness.
They wait for you at my command post at Burtali.
translation.fr: Ils vous attendent à mon poste de commandement à Burtali.

translation.en: But if I may ask Your Highness, is this war with the Igalas necessary?
translation.fr: Cette guerre avec les Igalas est-elle nécessaire ?

translation.en: They killed my sister.
And you think Danjuma is worthy of being a commander against his own people?
translation.fr: Danjuma est-il digne d'être commandant contre son propre peuple ?

translation.en: I am Amina.
Do not question my judgment.
translation.fr: Ne remets pas en cause mon jugement.

translation.en: As you wish, Your Highness.
Greetings, O Prince.
A message from the regent to Amina,
translation.fr: Un message du régent à Amina,

translation.en: Princess of Zazzau,
Daughter to the Sarki of the Seven Kingdoms.
translation.fr: fille du sarki des sept royaumes.

translation.en: The regent asks to meet with his nephew one last time before the battle is drawn.
translation.fr: Le régent demande à voir son neveu une dernière fois avant le combat.

translation.en: Tell my uncle that the only way to avoid war and save the lives of our people
translation.fr: Dis à mon oncle que pour éviter la guerre et sauver notre peuple,

translation.en: is for him to submit to the will of the Sarki of Zazzau.
translation.fr: il doit se soumettre à la volonté du sarki de Zazzau.

translation.en: The sarki will decide the way Igala's future lies.
translation.fr: Le sarki décidera de l'avenir d'Igala.

translation.en: You?
A prince of our people.
You turn against us like this?
You have delivered your message.
Return the answer.
Tell your prince I give him two days to respond.
translation.fr: Dis à ton prince qu'il a deux jours pour répondre.

translation.en: Else, I would unleash carnage on his town,
translation.fr: Sinon, je déchaînerai le carnage sur sa ville,

translation.en: burn down his palace,
and sell off his wives and daughters as slaves.
translation.fr: et vendrai ses épouses et filles en esclaves.

translation.en: Let him consider that.
You may leave.
You're late.
It was really difficult trying to leave.
I have to return before I'm missed.
translation.fr: Je dois rentrer avant qu'on me cherche.

translation.en: What is it?
Mero, this is our last chance.
With the sarki, you will never be queen,
translation.fr: Avec le sarki, tu ne seras jamais reine,

translation.en: but with the Madaki, it is very certain.
translation.fr: mais avec le Madaki, c'est certain.

translation.en: Amina is distracted by war right now,
translation.fr: Amina est distraite par la guerre,

translation.en: and before she returns, the Madaki will be seated
translation.fr: et avant son retour, le Madaki sera assis

translation.en: on the throne of Zazzau, and you will be his queen.
translation.fr: sur le trône de Zazzau, et tu seras sa reine.

translation.en: He also asked me to tell you that the seven kingdoms of Zazzau
translation.fr: Il m'a aussi demandé de te dire que les sept royaumes de Zazzau

translation.en: will be his wedding gift to you.
Calm down.
Calm down, Jakadiya.
It's a matter of time.
Everything will come to pass.
He's the one, Zaria.
You're reckless.
Danjuma! Danjuma!
He died like a hero.
He sacrificed his sword to save my life.
translation.fr: Il a sacrifié son épée pour me sauver la vie.

translation.en: I know the person responsible for this, Aladi.
- And he will pay dearly, rest assured. -
Your cousin will be avenged.
I loved him, Aladi Ameh.
- You loved him? - Yes, I loved him.
- Just as you loved Zaria… -
just as you loved Musa and Kabarkai.
translation.fr: Comme tu aimais Musa et Kabarkai.

translation.en: Everybody you love pays for it with their life, Amina.
translation.fr: Tous ceux que tu aimes perdent la vie pour toi, Amina.

translation.en: I weep for you, Amina.
You are now the monster they've always predicted you will become.
translation.fr: Tu es le monstre qu'ils avaient prédit que tu deviendrais.

translation.en: - You dare to mock my grieving? - You took my cousin from me!
translation.fr: - Tu oses douter de mon deuil ? - Tu m'as pris mon cousin !

translation.en: Turned him against his family, against his brother, and against his people.
translation.fr: Tu l'as retourné contre sa famille, contre son frère et son peuple.

translation.en: Now you returned his dead body to us,
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu nous rends son cadavre

translation.en: and his name will be branded in our land as a traitor.
translation.fr: et il sera connu comme traître dans tout le pays.

translation.en: Your ambition will never end, Amina,
until you have consumed every good man in this world.
translation.fr: avant d'avoir dévoré tous les hommes bien de ce monde.

translation.en: You're a monster, Amina!
And before this day is over,
translation.fr: Et avant la fin de ce jour,

translation.en: you will still have much more to grieve about.
He has no need for your chains anymore.
translation.fr: Il n'a plus besoin de tes chaînes.

translation.en: Bring my cousin home.
It is done, my king.
Take heart.
Now be strong.
No. Come on.
This is no place for a woman.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un lieu pour une femme.

translation.en: Take her away.
Don't worry, Mero.
Zazzau will honor you
for the peace and love you gave to the sarki
translation.fr: pour la paix et l'amour que tu as donnés au sarki

translation.en: in his last moment on Earth.
translation.fr: à son dernier moment sur Terre.

translation.en: You understand.
He doesn't belong here.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas sa place ici.

translation.en: Then why did she let him come back home to us?
translation.fr: Alors pourquoi l'a-t-elle laissé rentrer chez nous ?

translation.en: He doesn't belong there either.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas sa place là-bas non plus.

translation.en: Why wasn't the messenger from the palace brought to me immediately?
translation.fr: Pourquoi le messager du palais n'est pas venu à moi ?

translation.en: Why?
Someone speak to me.
You.
Speak to me or never speak again.
- The sarki is dead. - And has been buried.
translation.fr: Le sarki est mort et enterré.

translation.en: Madaki has been installed the new sarki.
Nothing! Nothing. Nothing.
This war will have to wait.
We fight another day.
translation.fr: Nous nous battrons un autre jour.

translation.en: I am going home.
She's going. The princess is going home.
What happened?
I believe your old friend just heard the bad news.
translation.fr: Ta vieille amie a appris la mauvaise nouvelle.

translation.en: Which bad news?
That her father
is dead.
The Madaki has installed himself
translation.fr: Le Madaki a pris le trône

translation.en: as the Emir of Zazzau and the seven kingdoms.
translation.fr: comme Émir de Zazzau et des sept royaumes.

translation.en: Oh no.  Amina is finished.
We can now sign a truce with Madaki.
translation.fr: On peut signer une trêve avec Madaki.

translation.en: Finally, Igala land is free from the tyranny
translation.fr: La terre d'Igala est enfin libérée de la tyrannie de la maison de Barkwa.

translation.en: of the house of Barkwa.
translation.fr: de la tyrannie de la maison de Barkwa.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau.
Princess Amina is on her way with her army.
translation.fr: La princesse Amina arrive avec son armée.

translation.en: Are you telling us she abandoned her campaign
without the permission of this court?
translation.fr: sans la permission de la cour ?

translation.en: She'll be here before sunset.
translation.fr: Elle sera là avant la nuit.

translation.en: No!
Where is Barde?
I say, where is Barde?
He is somewhere close to Burtali with a battalion, Your Majesty.
translation.fr: Il est près de Burtali avec un bataillon, Votre Majesté.

translation.en: Then you,
depart immediately.
Tell Barde that he should intercept Amina before she reaches the border.
translation.fr: Dis à Barde d'intercepter Amina avant qu'elle n'atteigne la frontière.

translation.en: Get out!
Highness.
Accept the council's condolence over the loss of your father.
translation.fr: Acceptez les condoléances du conseil pour le décès de votre père.

translation.en: The death was sudden, unexpected.
translation.fr: Sa mort a été soudaine et inattendue.

translation.en: And as we speak, the kingdom of Zazzau is in deep mourning.
translation.fr: Le royaume de Zazzau est en deuil.

translation.en: We had no choice but to bury him quickly with full honors.
translation.fr: On a dû l'enterrer rapidement avec tous les honneurs,

translation.en: The heat did not allow delay.
I get your message…
Yes.
…after you crowned your new sarki?
translation.fr: … après le couronnement du nouveau sarki ?

translation.en: - It wasn't my decision. - Barde.
translation.fr: - Ce n'était pas ma décision. - Barde.

translation.en: Chief warrior of the Sun of Zazzau,
translation.fr: Grand guerrier du Soleil de Zazzau,

translation.en: whose decision was it?
translation.fr: qui en a pris la décision ?

translation.en: I said whose decision was it?
No woman has ever sat on the throne of Zazzau,
translation.fr: Aucune femme n'a régné sur Zazzau,

translation.en: and you will not be an exception.
But we cannot take it away from you. It is your inheritance.
translation.fr: Mais on ne peut vous retirer votre héritage.

translation.en: The new sarki will accept a union between the two houses by marriage.
translation.fr: Le nouveau sarki acceptera une union entre les deux maisons, par le mariage.

translation.en: Your son will be the next king after him, Amina.
translation.fr: Votre fils sera le prochain roi après lui, Amina.

translation.en: And I want to put it to you.
You are not supposed to leave the battlefield,
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas censée quitter le champ de bataille,

translation.en: and you did.
That amounts to insubordination.
Tell your men to sheath their swords.
translation.fr: Dites à vos hommes de ranger leurs épées.

translation.en: Brothers cannot fight brothers.
Let us all come together and resolve this issue amicably, peacefully.
translation.fr: Rassemblons-nous et résolvons ce problème à l'amiable.

translation.en: Or is that what you want?
- So be it. -
I say, get out!
Get out!
You, get out. What are you doing here? What are you-- Get out!
Move to the battlefield.
I say get out. Get out!
The priestess, eh?
She gave you bath with the blood of Bayajidda.
translation.fr: Elle t'a baignée dans le sang de Bayajidda.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
Strike him now!
You didn't tell me it was going to be this bad.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'avais pas dit que ce serait si terrible.

translation.en: I did tell you, you were late.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit que tu étais en retard.

translation.en: The throne is meaningless.
Everybody who meant something to me is gone.
translation.fr: Tous ceux qui m'étaient chers ont disparu.

translation.en: It is what it is.
True, the price is high.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, le prix est élevé.

translation.en: But you must look forward now.
translation.fr: Mais tu dois te tourner vers l'avenir.

translation.en: Your people need you.
translation.fr: Ton peuple a besoin de toi.

translation.en: You have to fulfill your destiny for Zazzau.
translation.fr: Tu dois accomplir ton destin pour Zazzau.

translation.en: But how?
